onset.Description: Onset time for each trial during a given training run.

duration.Description: Length of time stimulus appears on the screen.

run_num.Description: The training block or run number (there are 4 runs of training)

is_pre.Description: If the scan was conducted before training (1 = yes, 0 = no).

stim_id.Description: Unique ID number to denote which face-blend is being viewed (1-9).

relevant_blend.Description: The category-relevant parent face included in the blend.

irrelevant_blend.Description: The category-irrelevant parent face included in the blend.

relevant_category.Description: The category-relevant category (1 = Miller, 2 = Wilson, 3 = Davis)

irrelevant_category.Description: The category-irrelevant category (1 = Miller, 2 = Wilson, 3 = Davis)
